title: Automating Pentest Delivery: 7 Key Workflows for Maximum Impact
description: Penetration testing is critical to uncovering real-world security weaknesses. With the shift into continuous testing and validation, it is time we automate the delivery of these results. The way results are delivered hasn’t kept up with today’s fast-moving threat landscape.
